title: Real-World Data Science Case Studies
subject: Data Science
theory:
Deep dive into how giants use DS.
- **Netflix**: Matrix Factorization + Deep Learning for recs.
- **Uber**: Time series forecasting for demand (Surge).
- **Zillow**: Regression to value homes.

real_world_use_cases.description: Uses NLP on song blogs + Collaborative Filtering.

summary: Seeing concepts applied at scale validates the journey.
